title: 看完这些视频你要是不笑 我服你了！
author: wuxx
txt_content:
哥已经快死了...笑死.............
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTgwNDc0MjUy.html
搞笑合集
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY3Njg1MDI4.html
碉堡的小老鼠
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzE5ODU3MTEy.html
超牛逼的恶搞
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTUzOTIyMDg=.html
上帝都笑抽了

replies.author: Тιмγα姬
replies.txt_content: 沙发.............我承认，我死了，笑死的，现在诈尸回复

replies.author: 我の↑屎界
replies.txt_content: RP不好，每个视频都是35秒广告= =而且是我笑点太高还是什么，我笑不起来啊

replies.author: diexue003
replies.txt_content: 好可爱的小老鼠  此鼠有力量
